tool_description: Cheapest Instagram API: HD profile pictures, download stories, reels, videos, photos and more!
title: Instagram API - Media Downloader

api_list.name: Get reel by Id
api_list.description: Get description and media of an reel by id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-media-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/reel/{reelid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-media-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get IGTVs
api_list.description: Get IGTV videos for a user. Use nextPageId for digging deeper into profile history.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-media-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/igtv/{username}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-media-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get stories
api_list.description: Receive all stories with download url for videos and photos

api_list.name: Get highlight by Id
api_list.description: Provides all images and videos of the highlight. This has the same structure as the stories endpoint

required_parameters.name: highlightId
required_parameters.description: This is provided by the Get All Highlights endpoint

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-media-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/highlight/{highlightid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-media-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all highlights
api_list.description: Receive a list of all highlights, including the cover image.

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: Use the userId from the basic profile call

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-api-media-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/highlights/{userid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-media-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get basic user profile
api_list.description: Get all general profile informations and userId which is needed for other calls
api_list.code:

url = "https://instagram-api-media-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/profile/basic/{username}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-api-media-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get detailed user profile
api_list.description: Get the full-resolution profile picture url, profile links, biography, internal information and more
api_list.code:

url = "https://instagram-api-media-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/profile/detailed/{username}"
